title: Raw Ingredients
description: We offer wholesale butters, waxes, oils, colors, botanicals & countless other raw ingredients. Click to see the possibilities.
cleaned_text: Raw Ingredients We carry a complete line of top quality raw ingredients that include natural vegetable oils, colors, clays, acids, butters, waxes, seeds, botanicals, essential oils and countless other fine ingredients. Whether you're a large customer looking for drums, totes or tanker trucks or small customer looking for a of couple ounces, we would love to be your vendor of choice. Our economies of scale allows us to offer market leading wholesale prices on almost everything we sell and our customer service is unmatched. For large custom quotes call the home office and talk to one of our friendly sales reps.
